Description:
IN served - You have not made arrangements for the effective management of health and safety which are appropriate to your activities, and the size of your undertaking, and which are proportionate to the risks to be managed. You do not have management arrangements in place to ensure that items of plant and equipment for which there is a statutory requirement for a competent person to undertake a thorough examination either in accordance with a written scheme or at intervals specified by the appropriate legislation, are being thoroughly examined by such a person at the required intervals

IN served - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely welding fume during welding of mild steel is either prevented or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that there is not suitable and sufficient provision of local exhaust ventilation equipment for use during welding activities.

IN served - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely
powder coating dust associated with the operation and cleaning of the powder coating spray booth is either prevented or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
